chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
f: input -> option nat
prec: input -> bool
prec_valid: forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v
cls: seq nid
cs: seq nid
Huniq: is_true (uniq nodes)
to: nid
this: nid
d: dstatelet
m: seq nat

Goal:
cs_safe this to d m -> coh d

Premises:
Notation coh := CalCoh
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
uniq : seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- eqType]
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Notation nodes := (cs ++ cls)
cs_safe = fun (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat) => [/\ to \in cs, this \in cls, coh d & prec msg] : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop Arguments cs_safe _ _ _ _%seq_scope
nid = nat : Set
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Some : ?A -> option ?A where ?A : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Type]
Notation seq := list
input = seq nat : Set
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
findPt_inv : find ?k1 (pts ?k2 ?v) = Some ?w -> [/\ ?k1 = ?k2, ?v = ?w & cond ?U ?k2] where ?K : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- ordType] ?V : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Type] ?U : [f : input -> option nat prec : input ->...-> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- ?V]
eqP : reflect (?x = ?y) (?x == ?y) where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- eqType] ?x : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Equality.sort ?T] ?y : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Equality.sort ?T]
or3P : reflect [\/ ?b1, ?b2 | ?b3] [|| ?b1, ?b2 | ?b3] where ?b1 : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- bool] ?b2 : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- bool] ?b3 : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- bool]
hasP : reflect (exists2 x : ?T, x \in ?s & ?a x) (has ?a ?s) where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- eqType] ?a : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- pred ?T] ?s : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- seq ?T]
mem : ?pT -> mem_pred ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Type] ?pT : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- predType ?T]
Protocols.rcv_tags : seq (receive_trans ?coh) -> seq nat where ?nodes : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- dstatelet -> pred nid] ?coh : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- cohpred ?nodes]
Protocols.snd_tags : seq (send_trans ?coh) -> seq nat where ?nodes : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- dstatelet -> pred nid] ?coh : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- cohpred ?nodes]
dyn_tp : {x : ?A & ?P x} -> ?A where ?A : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Type] ?P : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- ?A -> Type]
andP : reflect (?b1 /\ ?b2) (?b1 && ?b2) where ?b1 : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- bool] ?b2 : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- bool]
dyn_val : forall x : {x : ?A & ?P x}, ?P (projT1 x) where ?A : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Type] ?P : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- ?A -> Type]
valid : ?cT -> bool where ?cT : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- pcm]
head : ?T -> seq ?T -> ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Type]
PCM.join : ?cT -> ?cT -> ?cT where ?cT : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- pcm]
behead : seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Type]
perm_eq : seq ?T -> seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- eqType]
Unit : ?cT where ?cT : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- pcm]
mem2 : seq ?T -> ?T -> ?T -> bool where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- eqType]
cat : seq ?T -> seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Type]
all : pred ?T -> seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Type]
has : pred ?T -> seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Type]
in_mem : ?T -> mem_pred ?T -> bool where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Type]
eq_op : rel ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- eqType]
ssrbool.SimplPred : pred ?T -> simpl_pred ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Type]
simpl_of_mem : mem_pred ?T -> simpl_pred ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Type]
pred_of_seq : seq_eqclass ?T -> {pred ?T} where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- eqType]
eq_mem : mem_pred ?T -> mem_pred ?T -> Prop where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Type]
merge : rel ?T -> seq ?T -> seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Type]
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Type]
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Type]
SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
Record send_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := SendTrans { t_snd : nat; send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop; s_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d; s_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m ->...-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b); s_step_coh : Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step } Arguments Transitions.send_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.SendTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_snd]%nat_scope [send_safe]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [send_step] _%function_scope
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
sr_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> input -> bool
ss_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), ss_safe this to d m -> coh d
ss_safe = fun (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat) => to \in cls /\ this \in cs /\ (exists C : coh d, has (entry_finder to msg) (getSt this C)) : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop Arguments ss_safe _ _ _ _%seq_scope
sr_step = fun (this from : nid) (m : seq nat) (d : dstatelet) (pf : coh d) => fun=> (if this \in cs then let s := getSt this pf in st :-> ((from, this, m) :: s) else getLocal this d) : receive_step_t coh Expanded type for implicit arguments sr_step : forall this : nid, nid -> seq nat -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> this \in (fun=> [eta nodes]) d -> heap Arguments sr_step [this] _ _ [d]
ss_step_coh = fun (this to0 : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg0 : seq nat) (pf : ss_safe this to0 d msg0) (h : heap) (__top_assumption_ : Some h = ss_step pf) => let H : h = st : ->...-> localCoh n (getLocal n {| dstate := upd this b (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := {| tag := resp; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |})] Arguments ss_step_coh [this to d msg pf b]
getStE : forall (n : nat_eqType) (i j : dstatelet) (C : coh i) (C' : coh j), n \in nodes -> getLocal n j = getLocal n i -> getSt n C' = getSt n C
getStE' : forall (n : nat_eqType) (i j : dstatelet) (C : coh i) (C' : coh j), n \in nodes -> getSt n C' = getSt n C -> getLocal n j = getLocal n i

```intros Hcs_safe.
destruct Hcs_safe as [Hto_in_cs [Hthis_in_cls [Hcoh Hprec]]].
exact Hcoh.
```

original: intros Hcs_safe. destruct Hcs_safe as [Hto_in_cs [Hthis_in_cls [Hcoh Hprec]]]. apply Hcoh.
